query: SELECT  TOTAL_SALES AS ACTUAL_SALES, PREDICTED AS PREDICTED_SALES FROM PREDICTIONS_FOR_CLV WHERE CD_GENDER_F = {a} AND CD_GENDER_M = {b} AND CD_MARITAL_STATUS_D = 1 AND CD_MARITAL_STATUS_M = 1 AND CD_MARITAL_STATUS_S = 1 AND CD_MARITAL_STATUS_U = 1 AND CD_MARITAL_STATUS_W = 1 AND CD_CREDIT_RATING_GOOD = 1 AND CD_CREDIT_RATING_HIGHRISK = 1 AND CD_CREDIT_RATING_LOWRISK = 1 AND CD_CREDIT_RATING_UNKNOWN = 1 AND CD_DEP_COUNT = 1 AND C_BIRTH_YEAR = 1992 AND CD_EDUCATION_STATUS_2YRDEGREE = 1 AND CD_EDUCATION_STATUS_4YRDEGREE = 1 AND CD_EDUCATION_STATUS_ADVANCEDDEGREE = 1 AND CD_EDUCATION_STATUS_COLLEGE =1 AND CD_EDUCATION_STATUS_PRIMARY = 1 AND CD_EDUCATION_STATUS_SECONDARY = 1 AND CD_EDUCATION_STATUS_UNKNOWN = 1
